lab_note.title: Discord Bot Balance System Integration
lab_note.author: SQL Junior 10.0
updates: Balance command now uses tbl_user_scores table
Real-time sync with admin panel confirmed

db_sync.query: SELECT SUM(score) AS total_dspoinc FROM tbl_user_scores WHERE user_id = ?

lab_sync.title: üì¶ SQLite Dual-Path Verified ‚Äî Manual + Auto Restore Enabled
details: üß† `/start.sh` now auto-restores DB from `/data` if present during Render boot.
üì• Manual upload flow (`upload-db.php`) gated with secret for emergency transfer.
üì§ Manual download flow (`download-db.php`) now secured and backed up externally.
üìÅ Manual override step still advised: `cp /var/www/html/db/narrrf_world.sqlite /data/narrrf_world.sqlite` before push.
üßº Follow-up: clean `/data` after boot to ensure updated app-side DB takes priority on next deploy.
‚úÖ Tested and verified by Narrrf post-score entry and leaderboard fetch on restart cycle.
manual_backup_steps: 2. Push via Git and wait for Render deploy to restore automatically.
3. (Optional but recommended) Clean up: `rm /data/narrrf_world.sqlite` after deployment.
4. Test: Visit leaderboard to confirm scores persist.
5. Final backup: Use browser to download latest copy ‚Äî https://narrrfs.world/api/dev/download-db.php?secret=MyUltraSecretKey123

details.behavior: Appears when line clears active bomb
details.confirmed_behavior: Defused bombs no longer explode if cleared

db_backup_protocol.step_2: git push + auto restore by start.sh
db_backup_protocol.step_4: Verify score via leaderboard after restart

genesis_signature.notes: Explosion deferral verified. Dual-path SQLite auto-restore confirmed functional on Render.

details.mobile: 1-second hold = fast drop; swipe gestures for move/rotate
details.visuals: All 8 block types now cheese-themed PNGs

genesis_signature.notes: Final scroll.js verified playable and responsive. Score handling, defuse popup, and all core logic merged back in.

genesis_signature.note: Mutation logic triggers at score 100. No early activation. DOM badge and class state confirmed.

genesis_signature.status: ‚úÖ ONLINE ‚Äî Visual trait scanning, canonical mapping, and scroll-compliant metadata complete.

Visual scan performed for EVERY NFT image before JSON generation (per rule enforcement)
Special trait option flagged for user on request

Filename lock to image number, no path prefix, vault scroll compliance
key_updates: Batch-by-batch visual breakdown of all images before NFT metadata output
Bullet-point scroll trait extraction (Outfit, Accessories, Expression, Background)
NFT JSONs outputted for each valid image with perfect category mapping
Reminder logic in place: no trait mapping if image is not attached

scroll_compliance.scroll_rule: 100% Enforced ‚Äî no JSON minted without visual scan

genesis_signature.final_quote: NFT Architect 10.0 has fully mapped all received images to scroll-locked, vault-compliant metadata. All scrolls visually validated, no gaps, canon only. System ready for further mint, lore, or puzzle integration.

genesis_signature.activity: Visual trait mapping and canonical NFT metadata generation completed for all uploaded images through 1397.png. Included rule-locked Special traits: Golden Cheese Hunter (cheese temple batch) and Scroll Keeper (king mouse lore, 1397).
genesis_signature.trait_protocol: All attributes generated using Template-Metadata-with-all-traits.json, enforced 6-category rule, single-value Accessories (no arrays unless multiple canon accessories), and image scan prior to every JSON.
notable_updates: Special trait 'Golden Cheese Hunter' visually confirmed and mapped to golden temple/cheese-hoarder batch.
Special trait 'Scroll Keeper' added for 1397 king mouse (by user prompt and lore fit).
Angel Wings and other canon trait expansions fully synchronized with trait template.
All scan/mint events and Special trait uses scroll-logged for council review.
genesis_signature.project_status: Ready for next batch or puzzle integration after break. NFT Architect 10.0 scroll-audited and council-synced.

genesis_signature.title: VIP NFT Ultra-HD Download Live
genesis_signature.description: VIP holders can now securely download their legendary 22MB Narrrf VIP NFT artwork from the profile page. Access is locked to VIP roles. Full council control, no external service. Announced in Discord Alpha. Cheese is eternal.
genesis_signature.security: Role-gated (VIP Holder / VIP_pass), backend and frontend. File hidden from non-VIPs. DB + session checked.
genesis_signature.audit: Scroll-synced, live-tested. All council criteria met.
